requirement_designation: Science, Nature and Technology with Lab
class_notes: This lab course is in person.
course_description: CHEM 202L students will make qualitative determinations based on quantitative data. They will measure and analyze data including reaction rates, Rf values, etc. Lab will culminate in the development of the synthesis of an alcohol and the isolation of compounds, including a natural product.
prerequisites: (CHEM 141 or CHEM_OX 141 as prerequisite) or (CHEM 150L or CHEM_OX 150L as pre or co-requisite) and (CHEM 202 or CHEM_OX 202 as co-requiste),  or equivalent transfer credit.
